description:
Akihiko has been acting very strangely lately - even going so far as to suggest that Misaki move out. When Misaki has a bit of déjà vu helping a lost old man at the train station, he discovers he`s not the only one having relationship problems. Could the
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Into Each Life Some Rain Must Fall
Tsuki ni Murakumo Hana ni Kaze
